title: Travel Tuesday: Cabo (Christina Hanna)
text: Aug 5, 2015 Head to Cabo in your Lady Lux!Imagine a salty margarita in your hand while you bask in the sun's warm rays. You're lying in the most comfortable beach chair with a yummy taco next to you. However, that's not even the best part. Your wearing your sexiest Lady Lux Designer Swimwear bikini! You struggled this morning picking just ONE luxury swimwear item to wear. They were all SO cute, how can you decide?! But, you are in Cabo and so you decided on something sexy and colorful. If you're like us, you've had this Cabo fantasy for quite some time. If you are lucky enough to fulfill it, we've got some sexy suits picked out for every occasion.Imagine sitting on the beach in Tribal Temptation!Cabo is the ultimate place where you can show off. So why not wear something sexy?! The Tribal Temptation bikini is a great choice for a fun day in the sun! The warm colors illuminate Cabo's fun vibe, and the white base will show off your tan! This suit is the perfect suit to drink that margarita in and relax while embracing the sun.Night time can be a good time!Unfortunately, the sun has to set at some point. Fortunately, we have just the dress for you! The Tribal Temptation maxi dress is amazing! This dress is great for any night time activity in Cabo. Wanna hit the bars? Tribal Temptation Maxi Dress. Wanna have a romantic dinner? Tribal Temptation Maxi Dress. Anything you want to do, do it in the Tribal Temptation Maxi Dress.So, beach babe, enjoy your Cabo vacation...or fantasy. And most importantly, don't forget your Lady Lux.Head to Cabo in your Lady Lux!Imagine a salty margarita in your hand while you bask in the sun's warm rays.
